page.title: 11Law and Order in W.Itchenor
page.content: Itchenor is policed by patrol cars based at Birdham. The {Marine Police}have an office at the harbourside and their launch is used to patrol the water, boatyards, and marinas. Although the control of { {Rabies}is of vital importance they are mainly involved in crime prevention. Their patrol area extends from Chichester along the Sussex coast to Newhaven and 6 officers are maintained {H.M.Customs}operate from Itchenor. {The Chichester Harbour Conservancy} office at Itchenor administers all moorings and collects all harbour dues The office controls bylaws, has statutory authority over 8000 craft, monitors wild life, fauna, and footpaths.There are visitors moorings and scrubbing piles are available. The jetty is available at all tides and fresh water is free of charge..
